# Introduction
This paper is based around the reproduction of the paper by Cardinal et al. (2018). This paper is about SOC (soil organic carbon) storage. This is the amount of carbon in the soil. The model that is created in that paper contains different models describing the flow of carbon in the soil and trees next to it.

## The Model
The model is defined in the paper by Cardinal et al. (2018), this model follows a three pool model. 

$$ \frac{\delta FOC_{t,z,d}}{\delta t} = I_{t,z,d} + \frac{\delta F_{AD}}{\delta z} + h * f_{2}* dec\_HSOC_{t,z,d} + h *dec\_HSOC2_{tzd} - dec\_FOC_{t,z,d}  $$

$$ \frac{\delta HSOC1}{\delta t} = \frac{\delta F_{AD}}{\delta z} + h *f1 * dec\_FOC_{t,z,d} - dec\_HSOC1_{t,z,d} $$

$$ \frac{\delta HSOC2}{\delta t} = \frac{\delta F_{AD}}{\delta z} + h *  $$
